comment: She is a little scattered at times, and also talks fast, but she is a good professor. You can tell she cares and in my opinion that is important. The work is okay and most of the time you get to choose what to write about, which is unusual or at least new to me. I though it wasn't too hard of a class too.

Mrs. Ghattas was by far my favorite professor freshman year. I personally didn't buy any of the books and was able to slide by with good grade papers and okay quiz grades. She gives you a timeline of what you should be completing on your paper so you don't cram and write it all in one night which is nice and makes your papers better.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: I loved this class and I usually hate English. She sometimes seems to grade hard but once you read the feedback it makes sense. By the end of the semester I had managed a good grade and felt I learned a lot. She cares,and an extra is she's funny. Make sure you DO go to class, post in the Online Discussions, and keep up with the weekly assignments!

I liked this class and thought she was good teacher. Let me say, she is nice which can throw you off because in actuality she can be strict. Won't take late work for example and attendance is very mandatory or else you will fail. We had group discussions, a group project, and a research project that took forever but you learned a lot.

Best professor at KSU. I took her hybrid class, so attendance is mandatory. You have 1-3 discussion posts a week, but they're straight forward and very simple. He gives great feedback, and is so easy to contact. She cares about your work, you do 3 essays (no length requirement). You have readings, they're not overwhelming usually articles online.
Great professor. She makes instructions clear and she grades fairly easy. I recommend! She ralks really fast though, but I would definitely take again! Just make sure you come to class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: I enjoyed having her as as my English 1101 teacher. I will warn you that this woman talks super fast. But as long as you come to class and do the work, she'll respect you. Be ready to write a lot of papers in this class, which honestly sucks. However, after grading your paper, she always gives you a chance to revise your paper and turn it again
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: She's really good at her job, she knows a lot about the world and has interesting thoughts and ideas. 4 essays and a final. I am a terrible writer, but she made the rubrics very clear cut and easy to follow. she is willing to help if you seek her out. you do have to buy and read 2 books, interesting. aren't good @ writing take her. go 2 class!

I enjoyed this class. There were four major papers, a few smaller assignments, and daily writing prompts. Ms. Ghattas was always there to help, which I particularly appreciated, and we met several times throughout the course. She will really help you if you ask. She's smart and as someone said no-nonsense, but very helpful.

Ms. Ghattas is so awesome! She is super personable and easily relates to students! She is young, attractive, and passionate! Shes super knowledgable and fairly easy going. Unfortunately, she was not able to complete my semester due to a concussion injury. However, I wish I would have had the oppurtunity for her to teach me!

I had Ms. Ghattas for English my freshman year. What i remember was conferences, where she would meet with all of us to talk about our papers before we turned them in. She also worked in the writing center across the hall, which was cool. Not hard, not easy. Do your work and improve and you'll do fine and actually enjoy the class.

This is the only English class I have ever enjoyed. Professor Ghattas has a passion like no other, and she truly knows how to teach. I learned so much in this class about writing, argument, and critical thinking. Class was not easy but she will make you WANT to work!
You have to come to class, and yes there is writing, I enjoyed her class immensely. I would highly recommend her class.
AMAZING teacher. She is very helpful, almost always available if you need to talk outside of class. She's my favorite professor so far. I would definitely recommend her!

Great teacher. Extremely helpful inside and outside of class. Do the assigned reading though because she WILL give reading quizzes. A little difficult on grading essays. Overall, a fantastic teacher and I highly recommend her! She also uses youtube clips a lot and brought us cookies :)

Great professor. She did a good job of teaching the material so students would understand it. Sometimes I felt she graded too hard but she was always there to explain the grading so that helped. Good class overall.  A lot of activities and debates, plus good discussions got things moving. Also a lot of writing. Overall great teacher, great class.

Ms. Ghattas is really nice, helpful, and lenient.  She lets you bring in the rough draft of your paper if you forget to turn it in with your final draft etc. She's really easy to get along with, she knows her stuff, and she's very no-nonsense. She lets you out early often, and attendance isn't mandatory.  Take Ms. Ghattas, she's great.

BEST PROFESSOR EVER!She is really sweet and kind. Class is not difficult. 4 essays on simple topics and a couple quizzes on readings. My favorite professor so far. She will help with essays. Got an A in her class. I HIGHLY recommend her!!
I LOVEDD HER!!! She is always there to help and she is so so sweet. I would recommend speaking up in class and working hard on the papers. i got an A and i absolutely loved her!!

By far my favorite class of the semester. I love Ms. Ghattas! She is so helpful and willing to help everyone 1 0n 1. There are 4 major papers, which all are not too difficult if you apply yourself ask for help. A few reading quizzes, but also not too difficult. She is extremely intelligent and also really attractive! Take her class!!

Loved her!! Such a sweet lady who is willing to meet with you outside of class to work. Assigns alot of papers, and gives many reading quizzes. Has such a great sense of humor, and is really helpful. I recommend her!!! We also watch alot of YouTube :)

I was never good at writing & I didn't like to write either. Ms. Ghattas changed that entirely for me. She is an AMAZING teacher and extremely helpful. She will give you the help you need if you see her on your own time. We had 3 "major" papers & I made an A on all. GREAT lady, TAKE HER! I'll be taking her next semester for english 1102! Best teach
Awesome professor with interesting lectures and fun activities. We did debates and that was cool because it was a chance to DO what we had learned about. Recomended.

She was awesome. This was seriously my favorite class this semester, and I usually hate English. Some people here say she's easy, but I don't know about that. I would say that if you do the work and really try and improve then yeah it is not that hard at all. Especially when she gives extra credit chances, just do them and work hard and that's what
She was an awesome professor. Made the class fun and was extremely helpful, I HATE writing and still liked her class. If you do your work, its a guaranteed A or B.
Fantastic teacher, no excuse for not passing this class. Uses youtube examples and brings cookies occasionally. If you think this class was hard then you don't need to be in college.
I thought she was a great teacher. She's fun. A lot of great and interesting class disussions. Not many papers, pretty flexible on grading, very helpful. I reccomend her

This was a VERY EASY class.. she gives little work and is very flexible when it comes to grading. She's nice and isnt very strict on quizes or formal papers. i would definatly reccomend taking her class.

I had Ms. Ghattas last year and now my sister is in her class because she knows I loved it so much. She will take atendance every day and gives reading quizzes, but you will actually want to go to her class. So far my sister loves her too :D :D :D

i had her last fall and it was her first time teaching her own class and i thought she was awsome. we did alot of writing everyday but it wasnt too hard over all. shes really nice and gave lots of help if you needed it. i liked her alot.
Too hard. Too much writing. Bakes cookies sometimes, but you should still stay away.
I agree shes hard but fair and the class is atleast interesting most of the time. Makes alot of jokes in class and lets you pick what to write about.
Awesome!!! Take her

she's really nice. always willing to stay late to talk or to come in early and help. grades kindof hard but i think she's fair over all. fun class and we learned a lot. she assigns lots of writing assignments but theyre not that hard. i would take her again, for sure.
